author: Pomax
content: #Mozilla offices need fox plushies The Mozilla Vancouver office has a lovely Squishable fox plushie, and a neat little taiwanese fox plushie, so obviously I had to bring in "chibibifox" (a micro squishable fox) and "maokun" (a micro squishable red panda), and take some pictures of them adventuring around the office. The result may be found here: http://pomax.nihongoresources.com/downloads/plushies
